a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP price levels relative to the US, 1990 to 2021
The 'price level ratio of PPP conversion factors to market exchange rates' measures differences in price levels relative
to the US. A value below 1 means that a given sum of US dollars purchases more goods and services than in the US.
Data source: Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
